main event: An airman driving along Manitou Beach observed two bright lights pass over his car and disappear, with a gap of about 40 seconds between their appearances.
interesting points: The first light was stationary before moving with a slight circling motion., The object appeared to hover at a low altitude of approximately twenty-five feet., The airman described the light as bright white, illuminating the ground., The sighting included observations of both lights with no sound or exhaust emanating., The airman could confirm the absence of nearby houses or other motorists during the sighting.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
witness description: An airman, described as reliable and responsible, who was driving.
